## Coming soon

This guide will show you how to manage model versions and promote models to production.

You will learn how to use the catalog system for model lifecycle management.

**What you'll accomplish:**
- Version trained models
- Tag model releases
- Promote models to production
- Roll back model deployments

**Prerequisites:**
- Completed "Train your first model" tutorial
- Understanding of the catalog system

Check back soon for the complete guide.
